process_model.name: AS GSS Document Deletion
process_model.description: This process model will query the Delete document table for the documents scheduled for the current day and deletes the entries in batches

outputs.output_expression:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: pv!documentsToDelete,
  expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
    records: fv!item,
    modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD(
      recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted: true(),
      recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedBy: cons!AS_CO_TXT_GENERIC_SYSTEM_NAME,
      recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedDatetime: now()
    )
  )
)

constants.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_DELETE_DOCUMENTS_NIGHTLY
constants.description:
The toggle to turn ON/OFF the document deletion functionality. 

When this toggle is in ON state, the documents scheduled for deletion in the Document Deletion table will be fetched and deleted from the environment.

constants.name: AS_CO_TXT_GENERIC_SYSTEM_NAME
constants.description: Generic "System" text constant for use in audit tables and similar areas where a specific username might not apply, such as through an integration

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
constants.description: SINGLE_OBJECT - Returns a single type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET
constants.description: DATA_SUBSET - Returns a type of DataSubset when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMapList
expression_rules.description: Casts the input to a map list

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getDeletedDocuments
expression_rules.description: Generic query expression for Deleted document record data

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionDate,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!deletionDate
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isDeleted, default: { false })
    )
  },
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  fields: ri!fields
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionDate,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!deletionDate
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isDeleted, default: { false })
    )
  },
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  fields: ri!fields
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord
expression_rules.description: Given a model record, updates the provided records' fields to match those of the model record.  Nulls apply if the field exists in the model record.

test_cases.test_name: Update multiple fields, multiple records with other fields

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

inputs.name: checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull
inputs.description: Pass true if the rule input value is a CDT and check if all fields of the CDT is null.

test_cases.test_name: Value with list of CDT with all null fields
List of CDT with one of them not null

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_typeCompare
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the two input types match

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains
expression_rules.description: Enhanced wherecontains() which avoids type-casting issues and properly handles for document and group types

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_fetchDocumentEntriesToDelete
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to fetch the document entries scheduled for deletion

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfGivenDocumentExists
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to check if the passed in document exists in the environment

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfNullOrZero
expression_rules.description: Expression rule to check if the input value is either null or zero

test_cases.test_name: Non Blank Or Non Zero Value

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Deletion Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "As Gss Evaluationdocument Syncedrecord",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.asGssEvaluationdocumentSyncedrecord.documentName,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.asGssEvaluationdocumentSyncedrecord.documentName],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Deletion Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Deleted",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Deleted By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Deleted Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
